message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident it will be a great fit for you. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Can we meet in the middle of my original price and your offer?

I understand you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget.
